Sleek and Comfortable - HRX Men's Black Lower 

HRX by Hrithik Roshan has carved out a niche in the sportswear market, and its black lower for men exemplifies the brand's commitment to stylish, functional apparel. The HRX Men's Black Lower strikes a fine balance between aesthetics and performance, making it an excellent choice for fitness enthusiasts and casual wearers alike.

 In conclusion, the HRX Men's Black Lower is an excellent investment for anyone looking for multipurpose sportswear. It balances style, comfort, and durability, making it a practical and fashionable option for everyday wear. Whether you're hitting the gym or just going for a casual outing, these lowers have got you covered.
It is not pure cotton only 58 persent cotton and rest polyester written on the product,but on product description it was show pure cotton  and print is also worsted because it come out easily.
Very good fitting for me. Colour and comfort is perfect. But it is definitely not summer wear. Don’t buy it if you want to wear it in summers. Fabric is loop knit.
Perfect fit, may be a Tab lose at thighs . Perfect length for my 5.7 height . Good soft material and of course Great Brand .
I got a good deal i think for half of its original price and its a good product. I suugest to prefer hand wash for initial 3-4 washes.

Looks good when wearing. But after 2 months the product has lint all over it. The HRX branding print has developed cracks. Product looks like it's very old just after wearing occasionally in 2 months. I expected better HRX quality. Disappointed with the purchase.

product_desc: PRODUCT DESIGN DETAILS:Grey solid regular-fit mid-rise joggersHas an elasticated waistband with drawstring closureTwo pocketsCuffed hemsFeatures:MOISTURE-WICKING: Made with Flydry Technology that utilizes moisture-wicking fabric to effectively draw sweat away from the skin. This helps to keep you dry and comfortable during your traveling, preventing chafing and irritation.SQUAT PROOF: Ensuring a four-way stretch and a thicker material that won't become see-through when you squat or bend.ADJUSTABLE DRAWCORD: Made from durable and high-quality materials, ensuring that it remains securely in place even during vigorous activity. It is designed to withstand repeated adjustments without compromising its functionality or appearance.SIDE POCKETS: Equipped with easy access side pockets that enable you to have a safe place for your phone, keys, and credit card while allowing you to move hands-free.BACK YOKE: Enhances freedom of movement by offering additional flexibility. Its design allows for better range of motion, ensuring that you can perform your activities without any restrictions or discomfort.
